mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BTBS ( BTBS_SQ, BTBS_SITE_NM, BTBS_COMP_NM, BTBS_DOMAIN, ZIP, ADDR_1, ADDR_2, ADDR_3, ADDR_4, ADDR_5, BTBS_COMP_TEL, BTBS_CUR_TEMPL, BTBS_FUT_TEMPL, BTBM_EMAIL, BTBM_NM, BTBM_TEL, BTBM_PART, BTBM_RANK, STAT, REG_DTTM, REG_ADM_SQ ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL('TB_BTBS_SQ'), #{btbs_nm}, #{comp_nm}, #{btbs_domain}, #{zipNo}, #{siNm}, #{sggNm}, #{emdNm}, #{jibunAddr}, #{addrDetail}, #{btbs_comp_tel}, #{btbs_cur_templ}, #{btbs_fut_templ}, #{btbm_email}, #{btbm_nm}, #{btbm_tel}, #{btbm_part}, #{btbm_rank}, '01', now(), #{reg_adm_sq} )
mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.BTBM_TEL, '-', 1) AS HP_1, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.BTBM_TEL, '-', 2), '-', -1) AS HP_2, SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.BTBM_TEL, '-', -1) AS HP_3, A.*, B.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEM WHERE BTBS_SQ = #{btbs_sq}) AS BTBS_USER_NUM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PPRT WHERE MEM_SQ IN (SELECT MEM_SQ FROM TB_MEM WHERE BTBS_SQ = #{btbs_sq})) AS BTBS_DEV_NUM FROM TB_BTBS A, TB_CODE B WHERE A.STAT = B.CODE AND A.BTBS_SQ = #{btbs_sq} AND B.GROUPID ='BTBSTAT'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BTBS SET BTBS_SITE_NM = #{btbs_nm}, BTBS_COMP_NM = #{comp_nm}, BTBS_DOMAIN = #{btbs_domain}, ZIP = #{zipNo}, ADDR_1 = #{siNm}, ADDR_2 = #{sggNm}, ADDR_3 = #{emdNm}, ADDR_4 = #{jibunAddr}, ADDR_5 = #{addrDetail}, BTBS_CUR_TEMPL = #{btbs_cur_templ}, BTBS_FUT_TEMPL = #{btbs_fut_templ}, BTBM_EMAIL = #{btbm_email}, BTBM_NM = #{btbm_nm}, BTBM_TEL = #{btbm_tel}, BTBM_PART = #{btbm_part}, BTBM_RANK = #{btbm_rank}, UPT_DTTM = now(), UPT_ADM_SQ = #{upt_adm_sq} WHERE BTBS_SQ = #{btbs_sq}
UPDATE TB_BTBS SET STAT = '03', DEL_RSN = #{btbs_comment}, DEL_ADM_EMAIL = #{del_adm_email}, DEL_DTTM = now(), DEL_ADM_SQ = #{del_adm_sq} WHERE BTBS_SQ = #{btbs_sq}
UPDATE TB_BTBS SET STAT = '02', STOP_DTTM = now(), STOP_RSN = #{btbs_comment}, STOP_ADM_SQ = #{adm_sq}, UPT_DTTM = now(), UPT_ADM_SQ = #{adm_sq} WHERE BTBS_SQ = #{btbs_sq}
UPDATE TB_BTB_ADM SET STAT = '02', UPT_DTTM = now(), UPT_ADM_SQ = #{adm_sq} WHERE BTBS_SQ = #{btbs_sq} AND STAT != '03'
UPDATE TB_BTBS SET STAT = '01', STOP_REL_DTTM = now(), STOP_REL_RSN = #{btbs_comment}, STOP_REL_ADM_SQ = #{adm_sq}, UPT_DTTM = now(), UPT_ADM_SQ = #{adm_sq} WHERE BTBS_SQ = #{btbs_sq}
